Title: Raidió Corca Baiscinn 94.8 fm
Description: Raidió Corca Baiscinn is a wholly community owned and run radio station based in West Clare. We broadcast on 94.8FM to the whole region of West Clare from Labasheeda through Kilmihil to Quilty and all points West to Loop Head and to the rest of the world online. Our programming is as diverse as our volunteers  and includes daily news, debate, farming, documentaries, sports, drama, soundscape, nature and a wide range of music shows from trad to hip hop, 90% of which are volunteer produced and presented. We broadcast from 2pm to 9pm each weekday and 2pm to 5pm on weekends.

Title: Open Your Mind Radio

We aim to have interviews with guest speakers and add some humour and satire into the show as some of the things that we will discuss will be just plain laughable. Open Your Mind Radio broadcasts live every Sunday from 7pm to 9pm GMT

Title: Limerick City Community Radio

The station was licenced by the Broadcasting Authority of Ireland on 99.9FM at weekends on a 15-week temporary broadcasting licence from March to June 2014 and is currently broadcasting online with plans in place to return to FM later in the year. The output of the station, under the terms of our broadcasting licence, is mainly talk-based with an emphasis on local news and community affairs.

The attention to local DJs is also still there in force, & will continue to be, & grow along with the list of major shows brought to you on what is now Ireland’s foremost Independent online Dance Music stream. Title: Contemporary Celtic & Folk Rock Music
Description: I realized I have a rather large collection of Irish and Scottish music from when I was trying to do Celtic Studies before.  So, I decided to launch a Celtic Internet radio station in order to share these songs with anyone else who might be interested. There’s a pretty good mix that includes a plethora of styles, a grand variety of instrumentation, and a fair amount of what the Irish refer to as lilting but the Scots call mouth music (puirt-a-beul). For anyone who’s interested in other languages, a lot of it — and I mean A LOT — is in Irish and Scottish Gaelic.

Title: MixLive - Psybient Sunset
Description: https://www.facebook.com/MixLive.ie/ https://twitter.com/mixlive1 Have you been to the dark side of the moon? you're about to embark on an epic musical journey. Psybient Sunset explores Darkpsy, Psychill, Psybient & Goa Trance. Join us as we rediscover those classic sounds from some of world's finest Psybient artists. Aes Dana, Androcell, Capsula, Kick Bong, Carbon Based Lifeforms, H.U.V.A. Network, Sync24, Shpongle, Tripswitch, Zero Cult and many more.

Title: MixLive - Ambient Lounge
Description: https://www.facebook.com/MixLive.ie/ https://twitter.com/mixlive1 Ambient Lounge came online in January 2010. A deeply emotional and fulfilling collection of sounds. Join us on our quest, into a magical world of ambient, chillout and downtempo music. Perfect for meditation, relaxation, your hopes and inspiration. Music therapy for your body, mind and soul.

Title: MixLive - Progressive & Tech-house
Description: https://www.facebook.com/MixLive.ie/ https://twitter.com/mixlive1 Our progressive and tech house channels are now one live stream, broadcasting an epic mix of deep, minimal and techy sounds, with elements of minimal and techno, tech-house and progressive trance. Enjoy some of the hottest new releases and timeless classics, enter a world of underground music.

Title: MixLive - Trance Illusion
Description: https://www.facebook.com/MixLive.ie/ https://twitter.com/mixlive1 Listen to live streaming tunes from some of the leading progressive trance labels.

Title: MixLive - Bass Station
Description: https://www.facebook.com/MixLive.ie/ https://twitter.com/mixlive1

Title: MixLive - Open-Stage Project
Description: https://www.facebook.com/MixLive.ie/ https://twitter.com/mixlive1 The Open-Stage Project is a new music channel where members with Broadcaster role can connect and stream their own live music shows, with their favorite music software. You can submit an event before you're showtime, to let your listeners to know when you're live, more info Connect To Stream.

Title: MixLive - Chillout Essentials
Description: https://www.facebook.com/MixLive.ie/ https://twitter.com/mixlive1 Laid-back music on Chillout Essentials. Perfect for chilling on the beach, in the bath, in your garden or up a tree. What every you're at, we've got some classic chillout tunes to get you in the mood. Relax and enjoy 24/7 live streaming music online or download MixLive mobile app and listen on the go.

Title: MixLive - Minimal & Techno
Description: https://www.facebook.com/MixLive.ie/ https://twitter.com/mixlive1 Update 04-11-2017, Our Minimal & Techno channels have been combined into one live stream. Join us for your daily dose of Minimal & Techno, Detroit Techno, Dub Techno. Featuring exclusive releases & old school classics. Listen to music from artists such as: Jeff Mills, Adam Beyer, Laurent Garnier, Richie Hawtin, John Acquaviva, Sven Vath, Carl Cox, Green Velvet, Marco Carola, Carl Craig, Umek, Jaris Voom, Kevin Saunderson, Nina Kravis, Chris Liebing, Josh Wink, Solomun, Dave Clark!

Title: MixLive - 1000 Hits 80s
Description: https://www.facebook.com/MixLive.ie/ https://twitter.com/mixlive1 1000 Hits 80's, biggest hits from 80's music... pop, rock, italodisco... all are here! Michael Jackson, Roni Griffith, Ken Laszlo, Radiorama, Jules Tropicana, Fancy, ABBA, Lian Ross, Cyber People, Kano, Fun Fun, Scotch, Rudy & Co., Savage, Albert One, P. Lion.. Tous les grands hits de la musique des années 80's

Title: Phoenix FM Radio 92.5
Description: Community radio for Dublin 15. Phoenix FM currently broadcasts during evenings and week ends. The station’s programming reflects the wide range of views and interests within the community through programmes on the arts, sports, news, current affairs, local history and religious topics. Specialist music, emerging local bands and theatre and musical societies are regularly featured.

Title: Ocean FM 102.5 - 105 Carrowduff, Ireland
Description: https://www.facebook.com/oceanfmireland https://www.oceanfm.ie/ The perfect music mix (for the northwest) - Award Winning Local Radio for The North West of Ireland

Title: Time-Warp Internet Radio Ireland
Description: https://www.facebook.com/TimeWarpInternetRadioIreland Time-Warp Internet Radio Ireland - The music you will hear on Timewarp has been hand picked by a team who have been involved in radio for over 30 years. Using state of the art audio processing these classic tracks sound their very best on Timewarp!

Title: The 90s Network
Description: The 90s Network is an online all 90s radio station based in Dublin, Ireland. The 90s Network play a mix of pop, dance, rock and r&b from the 90s.
